messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Greetings, crew. Station goal today is DNA Vault. Please report all unusual activity to the appropriate heads. Thanks, and have a great shift.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Giovanni. Don't make this harder on yourself than it needs to be. Come quietly to the brig, and I'll see to it you won't be executed.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

The station is passing through a debris cloud, expect minor damage to external fittings and fixtures.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Station is on Code Red. Sec has been emagged and weapons have been stolen.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a pack of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Thanks to our security team, the perpetrator is now neutralized. They will be commended with a medal.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Darell Shafer is the new Chief Engineer. Please respect his authority.
